text: Stephen Everett Merrill (June 21, 1946 â€“ September 5, 2020) was an American lawyer and Republican politician. He was the 77th Governor of New Hampshire from 1993 to 1997. He was born in Norwich, Connecticut. Merrill was the Attorney General of New Hampshire from 1985 to 1989. Merrill died on September 5, 2020 in Manchester, New Hampshire, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Merrill at New Hampshire's Division of Historic Resources * National Governors Association profile * Merrill at Bingham Consulting website * Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Governors of New Hampshire Category:Lawyers from Connecticut Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Norwich, Connecticut Category:Lawyers from New Hampshire
title: Steve Merrill
